alert.note: Alert for Riverside (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 15 at 9:50AM PDT until March 17 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FOR THE WHITEWATER RIVER UNTIL 2 PM PDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Hydrologic flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Southwest California, including the following county, Riverside. * WHEN...Until 200 PM PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Flow in the Whitewater River could result in low-water crossings near the river becoming impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 950 AM PDT, Heavy rainfall has occurred in the San Bernardino County mountains, and water is flowing off the mountains and into the Whitewater River. The Whitewater River is expected to have flow into Thursday afternoon. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Southern Indio, eastern Palm Springs, Coachella, Cathedral City, Palm Desert, Rancho Mirage, Thermal, La Quinta, Mecca and Indian Wells. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
